name: Minigun Helicop Mission 3D
description:
Minigun Helicop Mission 3D is a modern warfare aerial strike helicopter arcade shooting game. The troops have to be transported from the army base to the point of battle. The user would be serving the army as a Helicopter Pilot who will perform various missions for the army like aerial strike on other bases, soldiers transport missions and ammunition movement mission.
features of the game:
Realistic war animations.
Dynamic camera angles.
Become the real commando solider by hitting enemy helicopter and aircrafts with precision.
Follow the instruction of air traffic control room.
Save passenger aircrafts along with cockpit, cabin crew and passengers.
Specialized cut scenes.
Use missile strike to unleash battlefield fury.
War sound effects.
